name: Half-demon Kamia
storyline:
This is a tumultuous world, home to humans, goblins, ogres, and a myriad of other creatures.
Half-demons, born of both human and demon blood, exist here as pariahs. Humans scorn them, while other beings view them as mere prey.
As a half-demon, you will brandish your weapon, harness your skills, and employ your wits. Engage in battles against diverse threats as you navigate this world, uncovering a narrative replete with unexpected twists.
summary: Half-demon Kamia is in a 3D single-player game, set in an expansive boxed world. Embark on a journey as a being torn between humanity and demonic heritage.
